metadata.name: AxiomHive
metadata.description: Edge-native hybrid SSM+attention AI with verified mode and Lightning payments.

components.name: axiomhive-core
components.description: Hybrid SSM (Mamba-2) + attention engine; parallel fusion for linear-time context.

components.name: lean4-proof-kernel
components.description: Lean 4 proof checker, axiom loader, and C=0 signature emitter.

components.name: wasm-runtime
components.description: WASM/WASI runtime packaged for Podman; SIMDxThreading enabled.

components.name: dag-scheduler
components.description: DAG task sharding, P2P/Merkle sync, and chunk reassembly.

components.name: lightning-payment
components.description: Neutrino SPV wallet, Lightning micropayments, and atomic streaming billing.

components.name: frontend-ui
components.description: Tauri desktop + React/Svelte PWA with Creative/Verified mode toggle.
